title: ASL~ Marathon December 4, 2016 at 7:30 am
description: SURPRISE!!! Yaya I'm official on list to race for half marathon (13.1 miles) at Rock and Roll event on Dec 4, 2016 at 7:30 am. I'm extremely thrill about it. I have been waiting for 5 FIVE YEARS. I have been struggling with my CCD (calves disease). I have been fighting to overcome it so i could be able to run again. My long patient with Lord worth my time. Have faith and trust with lord worth my time big time! Memories of 5 years inspiring me. Now please support me by rooting for me, praying for me, enjoy to watch me running, attend to the events (it's free) or inbox me for more information. God is so amazed!!! Please click 'like' on my FB page and click 'please subscribe' (free) on my YouTube, and spread this out to share for supports & spiritually.
name: Jennifer Alvarado
